name: "Fresh Buds From Mountains and Waters"
description: A small earthenware tea stove that is highly portable and easy to use. Its heating efficiency is considerable, making it a fine companion to any new tea-tasting endeavor.\nInviting some friends for a nice chat over a pot of some fresh new tea is a popular pastime in Qiaoying Village. Still, heed the advice of tea regulars from the village and Yilong Wharf: "Watch the fire and keep your windows open for circulation. That's how to stay safe while making tea on the stove."
